= Welcome =

[https://createvm.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/createvm.sh createvm.sh] is a script written in bash. With createvm you can create a VMware virtual machine with one command. It was made to  automate the process of creating Virtual Machines.

It supports a couple of command line parameters which allow you to configure the VM you are creating.
